pages.text: Pharaoh skazav, "Prynosyatʹ do meni kozhnyy dosvidchenyy charivnyk
Koly charivnyky prybuly, Moses skazanyy yim, "Kydayutʹ shchob ni vy zbyrayetesya kynuty
Koly vony kynuly, Moses skazaly, "Yaki vy vyrobleni zacharuvannya, ta BOH vstyhne ne spromozhetesʹ. BOH ne pidtrymuye porushnykiv pratsyuyutʹ
BOH vstanovlyuye pravdu z Yoho slovamy, nezvazhayuchy na zlochyntsiv
Nikhto ne vvazhav z Moses krim dekilʹka yoho lyudey, toy chas, yak bochy tyraniyi Pharaoh ta yoho elders. Bezsumnivno, Pharaoh buv bahato nadto zukhvaloho na zemli, ta realʹnomu tyrani
Moses skazaly, "O moyi lyudy, yakshcho vy diysno viryly v BOHU, todi stavyte vashu doviru u Yo, yakshcho vy diysno submitters
Vony skazaly, "My doviryayemo u BOHU. Nash Lord, ryatuyutʹ nas z persecution tsykh hnityuchykh lyudey
Dostavlyayutʹ nam, z Vashym myloserdyam, z disbelieving lyudy
My nadykhnuly Moses ta yoho brat. "Pidtrymayte vashi domivky u Yehypti poky shcho, povertayutʹ vashi domivky u synahohy, ta pidtrymuyutʹ Kontaktni Molytvy (Salat). Dayte harna novyna viruyucham

Moses skazav, "Nash Lord, vy daly Pharaoh ta yoho elders rozkish ta bahat·stvo u tsʹomu sviti. Nash Lord, vony tilʹky vykorystovuyutʹ yikh vidbyty inshi z Vashoho shlyakhu. Nash Lord, vytyrayutʹ yikhnye bahat·stvo, ta tverdiyutʹ yikhni serdenʹka zavazhyty yim z viryachykh, do vony bachatʹ bolisnyy retribution
